name: BuildingLink
0:
”Alexa, open Building Link.”
”Alexa, ask BuildingLink what's happening.”
”Alexa, ask BuildingLink for my digest.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: building link
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Please note: A BuildingLink.com account is required to use this skill. 

BuildingLink.com is the leading web-based property management software. Try our new skill — it makes some of your favorite BuildingLink.com features voice-accessible!

There are two ways you can interact with our skill:

1) To open a question and answer session with our skill, say, "Alexa, open BuildingLink." You will hear a menu and then will be able to ask any of the questions listed below.

2) If you want to skip the menu and get a quick response to a single statement, say any of the phrases below, MAKING SURE to say "Alexa, ask BuildingLink" before every statement. 

"Alexa, ask BuildingLink do I have any packages."

"Alexa, ask BuildingLink if my items have been picked up."

"Alexa, ask BuildingLink what’s going on in the building today."

"Alexa, ask BuildingLink to get my car." 

"Alexa, ask BuildingLink if there are any new announcements." 

"Alexa, ask BuildingLink for my account balance.

"Alexa, ask BuildingLink about my maintenance requests."

"Alexa, ask BuildingLink who's on duty."

"Alexa, ask BuildingLink how to contact the front desk."

Or you can say "Alexa, ask BuildingLink for my digest" to get a quick summary of many of the items listed above!

If your building's gym participates in BuildingLink's Aware Fitness Center initiative, you can also say:

"Alexa, ask BuildingLink tell me about the fitness center"
"Alexa, ask BuildingLink what machines are available."
"Alexa, ask BuildingLink if the gym is crowded."
"Alexa, ask BuildingLink how the gym feels."

Email us at alexahelp@buildinglink.com with questions/comments!

Disclaimer: This skill may not be suitable for all ages.
